mapper.select: /** kr.kyoungjin.dataobject.dao.AppServiceDao.selectUpmyundongList */ SELECT B.SIDO, B.SIGUNGU, B.UPMYUNDONG, A.EXCEL_KEY, COUNT(1) CNT FROM T_JOB_BINDING A INNER JOIN T_EXCEL_UPLOAD_DATA B ON A.EXCEL_KEY = B.EXCEL_KEY AND A.DATA_SEQ = B.DATA_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND A.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} GROUP BY B.SIDO, B.SIGUNGU, B.UPMYUNDONG, A.EXCEL_KEY ORDER BY CNT DESC
